name: Limited (OneSmallBoy)
description:
In a foreign land where your actions are restricted, you play as a man trying to find the get to his home in Blue Hearth. 

WASD or Arrow keys to move. Left mouse button to shoot when the ability is activated

Limited was made over the course of 3 days for the 104th Mini Jam with the limitation being "Finite Quantity". I decided to only allow the player to have a finite quantity of moves or inputs. 

All art and code made by me

Good luck!
